Article Title: April 12 ‚Äî China claps back on US tariffs, former Pak PM Imran Khan in court, IPL: LSG vs GT and SRH vs PKS
Article Text:
‚Ä¢ China retaliates with steep tariffs amid escalating trade tensions

‚Ä¢ Amit Shah set to pay tribute to Shivaji

‚Ä¢ Kumaraswamy to lead protest against Congress

‚Ä¢ Oman to host critical nuclear talks

‚Ä¢ IPL 2025 : LSG vs GT at Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium, Lucknow



‚Ä¢ IPL 2025: SRH vs PKS at Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium, Hyderabad





Other key events

call on Murmu

introduced as next president

Carnegie India's Global Technology Summit

elect new president

Mohan Bhagwat in Gujarat

Mohun Bagan vs Bengaluru FC

British Steel's future

PM Imran Khan to appear before a court

Daily LOL

Anniversaries



Unlocking the past

Last updated at 9.22 pm | Compiled by Rajesh Sharma

Beijing announced increased duties on American products, raising rates from 84% to 125% starting today. The move follows Washington‚Äôs broader tariff hike, including additional levies tied to fentanyl-related concerns. China‚Äôs Commerce Ministry also plans fresh legal action at the WTO, calling the US strategy economically meaningless.The Home Minister is in Maharashtra to pay tribute to Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj at Raigad Fort. He will attend various events, including a lunch hosted by NCP leader Aditi Tatkare. Shah will also meet state BJP leaders in Mumbai during his visit.JD(S) will stage a major demonstration in Bengaluru, led by Union Minister for Heavy Industries and Steel, HD Kumaraswamy. The campaign, ‚ÄòSakappa Saaku Congress Sarkara‚Äô, aims to highlight fiscal mismanagement and rising costs under the current administration.The US and Iran will hold nuclear talks in Oman as concerns mount over Tehran‚Äôs accelerating nuclear programme. The discussions mark a significant step in ongoing efforts to ease long-standing tensions between the two nations. Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi and US Mideast envoy Steve Witkoff are expected to lead the engagement.Nicholas Pooran‚Äôs explosive form meets Mohammed Siraj‚Äôs fiery new-ball spell as Gujarat Titans face Lucknow Super Giants. Titans lead the table with four consecutive wins, while LSG look to rise from mid-table. A gripping contest awaits with both teams in solid form.Sunrisers Hyderabad, desperate to halt a three-match losing streak, face a resurgent Punjab Kings led by an in-form Shreyas Iyer. SRH‚Äôs aggressive batting approach has misfired, while their star-studded bowling unit remains underwhelming. In contrast, PKS boasts strong momentum, with standout performances from Priyansh Arya and a sharp bowling attack.‚Ä¢ Italian Deputy PM Antonio Tajani willat the Rashtrapati Bhavan‚Ä¢ Tamil Nadu BJP floor leader Nainar Nagenthran is likely to beat a meeting scheduled at Shrivaaru Venkatachalapathy Palace in Vanagaram‚Ä¢ Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri to address‚Ä¢ SAD to hold delegate session to‚Ä¢ RSS Chiefto attend Valsad temple silver jubilee event‚Ä¢ ISL 2024-25 final:‚Ä¢ UK parliament to be recalled to discuss‚Ä¢ Pakistan‚Äôs formerin GHQ attack case‚Ä¢ International Day of Human Space Flight: Yuri Gagarin became the first human in space in 1961‚Ä¢ Birth anniversary Rajput ruler Rana Sanga‚Ä¢ Birth anniversary of Indian cricketer Vinoo Mankad‚Ä¢ Birth anniversary of former LS speaker Sumitra Mahajan‚Ä¢ Ranjit Singh declared himself the Maharaja of Punjab in 1801‚Ä¢ Euro Disney opened in Marne-La-Vallee, Paris, France in 1992
Article Summary: Home minister is in maharashtra to pay tribute to shivaji maharaj. Kumaraswamy to lead protest against congress. Oman to host critical nuclear talks. Pm imran khan to appear before a court. Uk parliament to be recalled to discuss pakistan‚Äôs formerin ghq attack case.

Article Title: MS Dhoni calls his longtime teammate a 'traitor' ahead of CSK vs KKR clash
Article Text:
MS Dhoni (Image credit: BCCI/IPL Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Which aspect of Dhoni's captaincy do you think will be most beneficial? Sharp game reading and field placements Calm decision-making under pressure

From golden duck to 39-ball ton! Priyansh Arya follows Ricky Ponting's first-ball six advice

WATCH:

NEW DELHI: Chennai Super Kings were dealt a major blow on Thursday as regular skipper Ruturaj Gaikwad was ruled out of the IPL due to an elbow injury. The setback has paved the way for Mahendra Singh Dhoni to return as captain for the remainder of the season, CSK head coach Stephen Fleming confirmed.Also See: IPL Live Score, CSK vs KKR "We have an uncapped player, MS Dhoni , who will take over as captain for the remainder of the IPL," Fleming told mediapersons ahead of Friday‚Äôs clash against Kolkata Knight Riders .Dhoni, who captained CSK from 2008 to 2023 and led them to five IPL titles, had handed over the reins to Gaikwad ahead of the 2024 season.Ahead of the upcoming fixture, Dhoni was seen practicing at the Chepauk nets when his former CSK teammate Dwayne Bravo‚Äînow the mentor of Kolkata Knight Riders‚Äîcame over to greet him."The traitor is here," Dhoni remarked."Life is so unfair," Bravo responded before sharing a hug with Ravindra Jadeja and then shaking hands with Dhoni.Bravo was part of Chennai Super Kings‚Äô IPL title-winning squads in 2011, 2018, and 2021. He also served as the franchise‚Äôs bowling coach during their victorious 2023 campaign.However, ahead of the 2025 season, Bravo parted ways with CSK‚Äôs coaching setup and took up the role of mentor with Kolkata Knight Riders.With Gaikwad sidelined, CSK now face a selection dilemma. Rahul Tripathi could return to the top order, although his form has been far from convincing.In the middle order, seasoned campaigner Deepak Hooda is a likely option, while the team might also look to inject fresh energy with young Delhi batter Vansh Bedi, known for his late-innings hitting ability.CSK are also entitled to a replacement for Gaikwad, with Mumbai teenager Ayush Mhatre being considered for the slot.
Article Summary: Csk captain ruturaj gaikwad ruled out of the ipl with an elbow injury. Mahendra singh dhoni will take over as captain for the remainder of the season. Dhoni captained csk from 2008 to 2023 and led them to five ipl titles. Csk face kolkata knight riders on friday.

Article Title: Disqualified from Olympics for being overweight, Vinesh Phogat opts for Rs 4 crore over government job
Article Text:
Vinesh Phogat (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

NEW DELHI: Wrestler-turned-politician Vinesh Phogat has opted for a cash prize of Rs 4 crore from the Haryana government after being offered benefits equivalent to an Olympic silver medallist.The 30-year-old athlete was disqualified from the 2024 Paris Olympics for being overweight ahead of her gold medal bout in the 50-kg category.Also See: CSK vs KKR Live Score, IPL 2025 Phogat, a three-time Olympian, had led protests against the former Wrestling Federation of India (WFI) chief Brij Bhushan Singh .She successfully contested the Haryana Assembly elections from Julana in Jind district last year on a Congress ticket.Recently, the Haryana government offered Phogat three choices under its sports policy: a cash prize of Rs 4 crore, an Outstanding Sportsperson (OSP) job under Group 'A', or a Haryana Shehri Vikas Pradhikaran (HSVP) plot.After considering the options, Phogat submitted a letter to the state sports department on Tuesday, informing them of her decision to accept the cash award, official sources confirmed it to PTI.Chief Minister Nayab Singh Saini had previously announced that the Haryana cabinet had decided to offer Phogat benefits equivalent to those of an Olympic silver medallist under the state's sports policy.During the Haryana Assembly's Budget Session in March, Phogat had reminded Saini of his promise to honour her like a medallist after her disqualification from the Paris Olympics."It is not about money, it is about respect. Many people from across the state tell me that I must have received the cash award," Phogat said.Saini acknowledged that Phogat was disqualified from the Paris Olympics due to a procedural decision and called her "Haryana's pride".He assured that he would not allow her honour to be diminished.
Article Summary: Vinesh phogat has opted for a cash prize of rs 4 crore from the haryana government. The 30-year-old athlete was disqualified from the 2024 paris olympics for being overweight ahead of her gold medal bout in the 50-kg category.

Article Title: ‚ÄúIM MAD I HAVENT F***ED TAYLOR SWIFT": Kanye West‚Äôs explicit posts about Taylor Swift spark speculations over ‚Äúobsession‚Äù and his mental health
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Kanye West‚Äôs sexually explicit claims against Taylor Swift sparks speculations about his ‚Äúobsession‚Äù and being ‚Äúderanged‚Äù



Taylor Swift has not spoken about the issue in public but has already taken legal action against Kanye West



Taylor Swift and Kanye West have been engaged in a feud with each other since 2009 even though the billionaire pop star has mostly stayed away from him and does not make any controversial statements. But Kanye West shocked everyone as he made sexually explicit claims against Taylor Swift on X and even spoke about having s*x with the billionaire pop star. Now, fans are trying to understand Kanye West and there have been some conclusions.In the last few hours, Kanye West made many posts on X where he dragged even his ex wife, the famous socialite, Kim Kardashian into it. But his posts about Taylor Swift have raised eyebrows.In one of his posts, Kanye West wrote on X, ‚ÄúJustin Bieber and Harry Styles f***ed Taylor Swift from both sides and didn‚Äôt call me. I can‚Äôt hold water. ON EVEYTHIIING THIS TWEET IS ONE THOUSAND PERCENT TRUE,‚ÄùAnother post read as, ‚ÄúI KNOW TAYLOR LIKE HOW THE F**K HE KNOW THAT, while a third post read as, ‚ÄúIM MAD I HAVENT F***ED TAYLOR SWIFT ‚Ä¶ YET.‚ÄùBut fans feel he is actually ‚Äúobsessed‚Äù with Taylor Swift and ‚Äújobless‚Äù.A fan took to X and posted, ‚ÄúThis guy is deranged and obsessed‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚Äúbro is so jobless lmao üò≠‚Äù.A third fan commented, ‚ÄúHe just wants rep tv too... /j‚Äù, while another user wrote, ‚Äúhis obsession with her is so weird, i kinda hate that she ever forgave him even a little because he took whatever kindness she gave and abused it.‚ÄùA fourth fan noted, ‚ÄúThis is beyond disgusting I feel so bad for taylor. She never asked to be a part of this narrative :( why can‚Äôt he leave her alone‚Äù, while another fan commented, ‚ÄúThis guy has in all seriousness lost his mind. üò¨ I literally can‚Äôt stand that jerk and his sexist rants towards Taylor.‚ÄùAs per Daily Mail, Taylor Swift has already taken legal action against Kanye West and has filed cease and desist against him.Just a few hours after Kanye West made such sexually explicit claims against Taylor Swift, he deleted those posts from his account. Until now, neither Taylor Swift nor Travis Kelce have made any public statements related to the whole controversy.For now, both Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are keeping themselves lowkey and staying away from the media.Also Read: "Baby news will soon arrive": Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce could be starting a family soon according to a famous psychic
Article Summary: Kanye west‚Äôs sexually explicit claims against taylor swift sparks speculations about his ‚Äúobsession‚Äù and being ‚Äúderanged‚Äù taylor swift has not spoken about the issue in public but has already taken legal action against kanye west.

Article Title: Alex Ovechkin's wife Anastasia Shubskaya gets $280K diamond ring from Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs wife after record-breaking goal
Article Text:
Alex Ovechkin with wife Anastasia Shubskaya, former NHL player Wayne Gretzky, and Gretzky's wife Janet Jones after scoring his 895th career goal (via Getty Images)


A goal for the ages: Alex Ovechkin breaks Wayne Gretzky's 26-year record FULL Alex Ovechkin Celebration Ceremony After Record-Breaking Goal No. 895 A legacy passed down: Anastasia Shubskaya receives diamond tribute from Janet Gretzky After Alex Ovechkin netted his 895th career goal and broke legendary Wayne Gretzky 's record, Janet Gretzky showed respect to a time-honored hockey tradition by gifting Anastasia Shubskaya , wife of Alex Ovechkin, an eight-carat diamond ring that had been estimated at $280,000. The Capitals may have lost to the New York Islanders by a score of 4-1, but the outcome was an afterthought to a night all about legacy, love, and a new chapter in hockey's history.The moment of history arrived at 7:26 of the second period. Alex Ovechkin let go of a blazing shot through fellow Russian Ilya Sorokin, making himself the NHL's all-time leading goal scorer. Fans inside UBS Arena lost their minds, and Alex Ovechkin commemorated the occasion by executing a belly flop onto the ice‚Äîcelebrating his big achievement.Alex Ovechkin celebrated this achievement in a pregame ceremony against the Carolina Hurricanes on April 10, 2025. He was given a six-foot sculptural painting by TYP depicting his skates and game-used sticks, with his image on it, with ‚ÄúMost Goals All Time‚Äù written on the top and ‚Äú895 Alex Ovechkin 895‚Äù on the bottom.While Alex Ovechkin was absorbing the enormity of his achievement, Anastasia Shubskaya was gifted a symbolic token of the historic night. Continuing a tradition started in 1994, when Colleen Howe (wife of Gordie Howe) gave Janet Gretzky a diamond ring after her husband, Wayne Gretzky, broke Colleen Howe‚Äôs husband‚Äôs record, Janet Gretzky ensured history repeated itself‚Äîthis time from one hockey family to another.In an interview with the media, Wayne Gretzky said, ‚ÄúA month ago, my wife said, ‚ÄòYou know, Colleen Howe started a tradition. I‚Äôm not sure if anyone is going to break Alex‚Äôs record, but I want to give her (Ovechkin‚Äôs wife, Anastasia Shubskaya) something really unique.‚Äô So, we went out and she picked out an eight-diamond ring for Alex‚Äôs wife. Not only do hockey guys pass down traditions. So do the families and wives.‚ÄùThe act not only spanned generations of greatness but also underlined the strong relationship between hockey families across generations.Anastasia Shubskaya, who tied the knot with Alex Ovechkin in 2016, is a Russian model who has appeared in numerous Russian magazines during her career and has built a strong social media presence. They are proud parents of two sons- Sergei and Ilya.Also read: ‚ÄúNow the real stuff is coming‚Äù: Alex Ovechkin skips The Tonight Show appearance to stay playoff-ready Even though the Capitals fell on the evening, the larger context is one of hope. The team had already secured a playoff berth and now has the emotional tailwind of reaching a once-a-generation milestone. With the NHL playoffs coming, Alex Ovechkin and the Washington Capitals aim to ride the wave of history toward what would be a fairy tale conclusion to the 2025 campaign.
Article Summary: Alex ovechkin scored his 895th career goal against the new york islanders on april 10, 2025. Wife anastasia shubskaya was gifted an eight-carat diamond ring that had been estimated at $280,000 by wayne gretzky's wife janet. The act not only spanned generations of greatness but underlined the strong relationship between hockey families across generations.

Article Title: ‚ÄúAdam Silver if you wanna fine somebody, fine that‚Äù: LeBron James called out by Isiah Thomas over shirtless pregame practice
Article Text:
LeBron James and Isiah Thomas. Image via: Marcio Jose Sanchez/ AP | AP

Isiah Thomas slammed LeBron James for his shirtless appearance on the court



Fans react to Isiah Thomas‚Äô criticism of LeBron James



With great fandom comes huge criticism, and LeBron James is no exception. James, who has received astonishing fame and accolades over the years in his glorious career in the NBA, has recently been called out by former Detroit Pistons point guard and NBA analyst, Isiah Thomas as the Lakers legend appeared shirtless in his pregame practices on the court. Thomas called the gesture unprofessional and said that the NBA should punish it.The Los Angeles Lakers are set to face the Houston Rockets in a crucial matchup on Friday, April 11. The game is going to be quite important for both teams, with a lot at stake. James, who is available to play the highly anticipated showdown at the Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles, has been called out by NBA legend and analyst Isiah Thomas.James appeared shirtless on the court ahead of the game for his practice sessions, which did not go well with Thomas. ‚ÄúI would never let one of my player walk out on the floor looking like this. I mean, we are professional NBA league. We ain‚Äôt summer league,‚Äù Thomas said. "I totally 100% object to this.‚Äù‚ÄúI just think that the professionalism in our NBA league has diminished so much," he continued.Thomas went on to add, ‚ÄúLook I like LeBron, I‚Äôm a fan of his but to walk out on a floor before game with no shirt on, come on, man, this‚Ä¶ Where we at? What we doing?‚Äù‚ÄúAdam Silver if you wanna fine somebody, fine that, put a fine on that,‚Äù he added, urging the Commissioner of the NBA to punish James for his shirtless appearance.Fans online, however, are not very pleased with Thomas‚Äô plea for LeBron James‚Äô punishment.‚ÄúI watched him walk off the court with time left on clock, past my Bulls bench, no hand shakes, nothing. That is as UNPROFESSIONAL as I‚Äôve ever seen. Fkn hypocrite. What a joke,‚Äù one fan wrote on X.‚ÄúI‚Äôm not even LeBron guy but this is ridiculous. Zeke has done a lot of major things wrong and is mad Bron is shooting a basketball without his shirt on,‚Äù another wrote, supporting James.‚ÄúWhat a farce. This league has gone downhill so much.‚ÄùOne fan initially thought it was a joke, ‚ÄúI watched this on NBATV. Come on now, it's pre-game warmups. I thought Isiah was messing around and going to compliment him on his physique, which led him to say that. I get that the NBA is different now, but this is LeBron. Relax.‚Äù‚ÄúThis look like the warmup before the official warmup.. like before the fans even get there. Nahhh zeke. Lol‚Äù‚Äúwhy are we giving screen time to Isaiah?‚ÄùAlso Read: LeBron James "I love everything about that guy" explains why he'd want to play with Steph Curry As for LeBron James, he has been in great shape and, at 40, is still playing at an elite level. James is currently averaging 24.6 points per game, 7.9 rebounds, and 8.2 assists.
Article Summary: Isiah thomas slammed lebron james for his shirtless appearance on the court. Thomas called the gesture unprofessional and said that the nba should punish it. James is currently averaging 24.6 points per game, 7.9 rebounds, and 8.2 assists.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI hope you feel loved‚Äù: Alex Vesia‚Äôs wife Kayla Vesia shares an adorable birthday wish for him
Article Text:
Alex Vesia‚Äôs wife Kayla Vesia shares sweet adorable birthday wish for him (Image Source: Instagram)

Alex Vesia‚Äôs wife Kayla Vesia shares sweet birthday message

Alex Vesia‚Äôs fans wish him a happy birthday

The Los Angeles Dodgers‚Äô brilliant face, Alex Vesia is now 29-years-old. One of their ace pitchers, and confident persona, had made a name for himself that will be remembered for ages to come. Alex Vesia‚Äôs friends and family wished him a happy birthday where they shared beautiful memories with him.The Los Angeles Dodgers‚Äô pitcher, Alex Vesia celebrated his birthday and his wife, Kayla Vesia took to Instagram to celebrate the love of her life‚Äôs birthday. Kayla shared a series of Instagram photos which featured her husband.In the first photo, that was black and white, Alex and Kayla looked happy as ever, as they danced. The two wore stunning outfits and looked chic. Kayla captioned the photo, ‚Äúhappy birthday to the love of my life, you light up my world everyday.‚ÄùIn the next photo, Alex and Kayla posed in a stunning backdrop under a cave, where Kayla captioned the photo, ‚Äúevery year together gets better and better!! I hope you feel so loved and celebrated.‚Äù The two decided to wear all whites.In the third photo shared on Instagram, Alex kept his dog on his lap, as the two played and enjoyed their time. Kayla captioned the photo saying, ‚Äúthe best dog dad ever.‚Äù The photo looked adorable as ever.In the last photo, both Alex and Kayla looked super fresh. The two posed in front of a large audience. Kayla captioned the photo, ‚ÄúI love you birthday boy.‚ÄùNot just Alex Vedia‚Äôs friends and family, but fans too were overjoyed to wish him a happy birthday. His fans took to X where she shared birthday greetings for their favourite player.His fans shared their warm and exciting greetings.A fan said:‚ÄúArguably the most underrated bullpen arm in the league. hbd Vesii.‚ÄùAnother fan said:‚ÄúHappy Birthday my left handed Hispanic KING.‚ÄùAnother fan said:‚ÄúGive up grand slams to the strike out king.‚ÄùA fan called him the World Series Champion:*World Series Champion Alex Vesia.‚ÄùWhile another fan said:‚ÄúHappy birthday to my crashout king.‚ÄùAlso Read: Alex Vesia Net Worth 2025: Income, Salary, Investments And More
Article Summary: The los angeles dodgers‚Äô pitcher, alex vesia celebrated his birthday and his wife, kayla vesia took to instagram to celebrate the love of her life‚Äôs birthday. His friends and family wished him a happy birthday where they shared beautiful memories with him.

Article Title: Shedeur Sanders throws shade at NFL teams while embracing possible backup role to Aaron Rodgers
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Shedeur Sanders impressed during Steelers visit and shared mutual respect with the coaching staff

Learning from a legend? Sheduer Sanders welcomes the idea of sitting behind Aaron Rodgers

As the 2025 NFL Draft looms, Shedeur Sanders is making headlines not only for his talent but also for his poised and grounded mindset. The Colorado star quarterback recently completed a high-profile visit with the Pittsburgh Steelers , a franchise long associated with football tradition, grit, and championship pedigree. While questions swirl around the team‚Äôs quarterback future ‚Äî especially with Aaron Rodgers in the mix ‚Äî Sanders has made it clear he‚Äôs open to whatever path unfolds.Describing his visit to Pittsburgh in glowing terms, Sheduer Sanders told Kay Adams in an interview, ‚ÄúIt was a 10. I enjoyed my time in Pittsburgh. I connected well with all the coaches and it was really fun. The best part of the day of course was talking football. It‚Äôs my favorite part. It‚Äôs just really getting to know each other.‚ÄùThat connection could prove vital as Pittsburgh eyes its next franchise quarterback. With the No. 21 overall pick, the Steelers may find Sanders available ‚Äî but whether he slides that far is still uncertain. The Heisman hopeful remains confident that teams passing on him would be making a costly mistake. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs on the people. That‚Äôs on the other franchises that make their mistake and let me go there (Pittsburgh),‚Äù he said, signaling his readiness to thrive in the Steelers' system.Perhaps the biggest twist in this potential match-up is the reported interest from the Steelers in Aaron Rodgers ‚Äî the veteran quarterback whose legacy includes a Super Bowl title and multiple MVP awards. Rodgers is still deciding his future, but if he does land in Pittsburgh, Sanders may find himself in a backup role early on. Rather than balking at the idea, Sanders showed maturity beyond his years.‚ÄúWe didn‚Äôt talk about anybody,‚Äù Sanders said about Rodgers. ‚ÄúIf that‚Äôs the way that things play out, that‚Äôs how it‚Äôll play out (learn behind Rodgers). I wouldn‚Äôt question what God has planned for me.‚ÄùAlso Read: Why Aaron Rodgers‚Äô weekly appearances are raising eyebrows in sports media ‚Äî Has Pat McAfee given him too much power? In an era where young quarterbacks often demand immediate starts, Sanders‚Äô calm acceptance of potentially learning under Rodgers speaks volumes. Whether he starts Day 1 or takes time to develop, the 21-year-old is already demonstrating the mindset of a future NFL leader ‚Äî and possibly the next great Steeler under center.
Article Summary: Shedeur sanders impressed during steelers visit and shared mutual respect with the coaching staff. With the no. 21 overall pick, the steelers may find sanders available. Rodgers is still deciding his future, but if he does land in pittsburgh, sanders may find himself in a backup role.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt care, and it never ends‚Äù: Josh Berry sounds off on Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce obsession
Article Text:
Images via Tireball and Getty Images

Josh Berry shares frustration over being known for going to school with Taylor Swift, not for racing

Josh Berry, Las Vegas Recap, and a Big Miami Weekend Coming Up

Josef Newgarden and Josh Berry bond over shared roots and racing journey



NASCAR driver Josh Berry has had enough of Taylor Swift questions ‚Äî and he‚Äôs making that very clear. Though the two attended the same high school in Hendersonville, Tennessee, Berry says the constant fascination with Swift's personal life, especially her relationship with NFL star Travis Kelce , has become overwhelming.In a recent appearance on the Rubbin is Racing podcast, Berry spoke candidly about how one offhand comment during a past interview snowballed into a recurring distraction. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs one of those things when you‚Äôre like doing an interview one day and somebody‚Äôs like, hey, what‚Äôs a funny crazy story about you, right? And I‚Äôm like, oh, I went to school with Taylor Swift, and you don‚Äôt think that that‚Äôs that big of a deal,‚Äù he explained.But once Swift began dating Travis Kelce, the buzz around his old schoolmate reached new heights. ‚ÄúBut I mean, good gosh! Man, every time it never ends. And then she starts dating Travis Kelce, and it all comes back again, and I‚Äôm like I don‚Äôt care about Travis Kelce, like I don‚Äôt care, and it never ends,‚Äù Berry added with exasperation.While his frustration is clear, it also highlights a recurring challenge many athletes face: being overshadowed by pop culture associations that have little to do with their careers.Interestingly, Berry wasn‚Äôt the only motorsport name to walk those high school halls. Josef Newgarden, a two-time IndyCar champion, was also a classmate. The two have reconnected in recent years thanks to Berry‚Äôs move to Wood Brothers Racing, which shares a technical alliance with Team Penske ‚Äî Newgarden‚Äôs home team.Their renewed bond led them to return to their alma mater during the off-season through a visit sponsored by shared partner PPG. The drivers spoke with students, posed for photos, and endured a few laughs at their own expense. ‚ÄúThe kids had a field day teasing us after finding our old yearbook photos,‚Äù Berry recalled.Also Read: The real reason Taylor Swift avoids Coachella: Why the pop star's absence from the music festival continues to stand out Though their paths diverged after high school, the revelation that they both came from the same small-town classrooms and went on to thrive in elite racing circles has only added a new layer to their friendship ‚Äî one that has nothing to do with Taylor Swift.
Article Summary: Nascar driver josh berry attended the same high school as taylor swift. Berry says the constant fascination with swift's personal life, especially her relationship with nfl star travis kelce, has become overwhelming. Berry wasn't the only motorsport name to walk those high school halls: indycar champion josef newgarden was also a classmate.

Article Title: Why is Ruturaj Gaikwad not playing CSK vs KKR IPL 2025 match?
Article Text:
Ruturaj Gaikwad (Image credit: BCCI/IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

MS Dhoni returns as CSK Captain, confirms coach Stephen Fleming

Kolkata Knight Riders (Playing XI):

Chennai Super Kings (Playing XI):

NEW DELHI: Chennai Super Kings suffered a major setback as regular skipper Ruturaj Gaikwad was ruled out of the IPL due to an elbow injury ‚Äî a development that has paved the way for Mahendra Singh Dhoni to return to the leadership role. CSK head coach Stephen Fleming confirmed the news on Thursday. Gaikwad sustained the injury after being struck by a short ball from Jofra Archer during CSK‚Äôs IPL 2025 clash against Rajasthan Royals." Ruturaj Gaikwad ruled out of IPL with fracture on elbow. MS Dhoni to take over as captain," Fleming told mediapersons on Thursday.‚ÄúHe (Gaikwad) got hit in Guwahati. He‚Äôs been operating with an amount of pain. We got an X-ray, which was inconclusive, and we had an MRI, which revealed a fracture in his elbow, in the radial neck. So we‚Äôre disappointed and feel for him. We appreciate the efforts that he‚Äôs gone to in terms of trying to play, but unfortunately, he‚Äôd be out of the tournament from now. We have an uncapped player, MS Dhoni, who will take over as captain for the remainder of the IPL," Fleming added at a press conference.Dhoni, who came out for the toss for CSK, also confirmed that Gaikwad was ruled out of the season. He made two changes to the Playing XI, bringing in Rahul Tripathi in place of Gaikwad and including Anshul Kamboj for Mukesh Choudhary."We were looking to bat first. Quite a few occasions where we tried to chase it down and what we realised is that the wicket slows down a bit, so if you don't get a good start then the middle order comes under pressure. (On Ruturaj) He has fractured something on his elbow, so he is ruled out of the tournament. He is a very authentic batter, someone who looks to time the ball well. So yeah, he will be a big miss," Dhoni said during the toss."(On the importance of winning this game) It is important now, every game is important. We have lost too many matches and now it is important to do the basics right - have dot balls, take our catches. A couple of games we lost by big margins, but otherwise it was about the small things - about one over going for 20 runs. Our batters are more authentic as batters, they won't slog everything. They just need to back their instincts. It is important to start well, get boundaries early on and try to get a couple of early wickets as well. Couple of changes for us - Tripathi comes in for Ruturaj, and Anshul Kambhoj in for Mukesh," he said.Quinton de Kock(w), Sunil Narine, Ajinkya Rahane(c), Venkatesh Iyer, Rinku Singh, Moeen Ali, Andre Russell, Ramandeep Singh, Harshit Rana, Vaibhav Arora, Varun ChakaravarthyRachin Ravindra, Devon Conway, Rahul Tripathi, Vijay Shankar, Shivam Dube, MS Dhoni(w/c), Ravindra Jadeja, Ravichandran Ashwin, Noor Ahmad, Anshul Kamboj, Khaleel Ahmed
Article Summary: Ruturaj gaikwad ruled out of ipl with fracture on elbow. Csk head coach stephen fleming confirmed the news on thursday. Ms dhoni will take over as captain for the remainder of the ipl. Rahul tripathi comes in for ruturaj, and anshul kambhoj for mukesh.

Article Title: Record low for CSK! MS Dhoni's comeback marred by historic collapse at Chepauk
Article Text:
MS Dhoni (BCCI/IPL Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

From golden duck to 39-ball ton! Priyansh Arya follows Ricky Ponting's first-ball six advice

Lowest 1st innings totals for CSK in IPL history:

NEW DELHI: MS Dhoni 's return as Chennai Super Kings (CSK) captain in IPL 2025 wasn‚Äôt marked by the kind of dominance fans at Chepauk are used to. Instead, it turned out to be a forgettable outing for the home side, as they were restricted to just 103 for 9 in their 20 overs by a clinical Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) bowling unit.This total (103/9) is now CSK‚Äôs lowest-ever score at their home ground, the MA Chidambaram Stadium .The collapse was triggered by KKR‚Äôs spinners, who accounted for six CSK wickets ‚Äî the most wickets CSK have ever lost to spin in a single IPL innings.The Chepauk pitch, known for assisting spin, worked against the home side on the day, as the likes of Sunil Narine and Varun Chakaravarthy applied the chokehold with clever variations and accuracy.97 vs Mumbai Indians, Wankhede, 2022103/9 vs KKR, Chennai, 2025*109 vs Rajasthan Royals, Jaipur, 2008110/8 vs Delhi Daredevils, Delhi, 2012The 103/9 against KKR also stands as the second-lowest total ever recorded by any team at Chepauk, only behind Royal Challengers Bengaluru‚Äôs 70 all-out against CSK in 2019.
Article Summary: Chennai super kings (csk) bowled out for 103 against kolkata knight riders (kkr) the total is csk‚Äôs lowest-ever score at their home ground, the ma chidambaram stadium. Csk have lost six wickets to spin in a single ipl innings.

Article Title: Rohit Sharma shouts 'abey mera kya le rha hai?' as dust storm interrupts Mumbai Indians' practice in Delhi - WATCH
Article Text:
Image credit: Mumbai Indians

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Abey mera kya le rha hai? Wo video le

IPL: RCB mentor Karthik questions Chinnaswamy pitch after twin defeats

NEW DELHI: Delhi Capitals are set to host Mumbai Indians in their IPL 2025 clash at the Arun Jaitley Stadium on Sunday. The Hardik Pandya-led Mumbai Indians have already arrived in the capital and are currently training in the city.However, their preparations were affected as Delhi and surrounding NCR regions experienced a sudden dip in temperature on Friday, accompanied by dusty storms for the second consecutive day. The weather disrupted flight operations at the Delhi airport, leading to multiple delays and diversions ‚Äî and even impacted Mumbai Indians‚Äô practice session.In a video shared by the Mumbai Indians on their social media platforms, star batter Rohit Sharma is seen reacting humorously to the incoming storm. As strong winds hit the stadium, Rohit can be heard shouting ‚Äúcomeback‚Äù to his teammates. He then playfully tells the cameraman to focus on the storm instead of him.(Hey, why are you filming me? Shoot the storm instead)," Rohit says in the clip.Meanwhile, the India Meteorological Department (IMD) has issued a yellow alert for Delhi on April 11, with temperatures expected to range between 23¬∞C and 38¬∞C.While the storms caused disruption, the overcast skies and cooler winds brought a brief respite from the heatwave that had gripped the region over the past week.Delhi Capitals remain the only unbeaten side in the tournament so far with four wins from four matches.Mumbai Indians, on the other hand, are struggling at the bottom half of the table ‚Äî placed eighth with just one win and four defeats in five games.
Article Summary: Delhi capitals to host mumbai indians in their ipl 2025 clash on sunday. Mumbai indians have already arrived in the capital and are currently training. Delhi and surrounding ncr regions experienced a sudden dip in temperature on friday, accompanied by dusty storms for the second consecutive day.

Stand-in captain MS Dhoni will lead Chennai Super Kings against Ajinkya Rahane's Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) in match no 25 of the Indian Premier League (IPL) at the MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai. CSK are currently placed at the ninth place, whereas KKR at the sixth position on the point table.Also See: IPL Live Score, CSK vs KKR On the eve of the match, CSK head coach Stephen Fleming has revealed that an elbow injury has ruled out Ruturaj Gaikwad from the tournament.An MRI confirmed that Gaikwad, 28, has an elbow fracture, Fleming said, adding that Dhoni would take over as captain for the remainder of the IPL."Unfortunately, Ruturaj Gaikwad is going to be ruled out of the tournament," Fleming said. "(Gaikwad) got hit in Guwahati. He's been operating with an amount of pain."Dhoni, 43, led Chennai from 2008 until 2024, when he handed the captaincy to Gaikwad.He had also handed the captaincy to Ravindra Jadeja in 2022, but took back the leadership midway through the season after a string of disappointing results. Under Dhoni, CSK have won five IPL titles, the last in 2023, as well as two Champions League trophies. The team however had a dismal start to the current season, losing four of their first five matches.KKR on the other hand, will be smarting from their narrow loss against Lucknow Super Giants three days back, and will look to get back to winning ways before it gets too late for the defending champions.The Chepauk pitch is anticipated to be slow and difficult for batting, requiring careful adjustment. Spinners will be a major factor, with both teams possessing strong spin attacks. Recent results suggest batting first will be preferred.Devon Conway, Rachin Ravindra, Rahul Tripathi, Shivam Dube, Vijay Shankar, Ravindra Jadeja, MS Dhoni (c & wk), R Ashwin, Noor Ahmad, Mukesh Choudhary, Khaleel Ahmed,Matheesha PathiranaQuinton de Kock (wk), Sunil Narine, Ajinkya Rahane (c), Venkatesh Iyer, Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Rinku Singh, Andre Russell, Ramandeep Singh, Moeen Ali, Harshit Rana, Vaibhav AroraVarun ChakravarthyRuturaj Gaikwad (c), MS Dhoni, Ravindra Jadeja, Shivam Dube, Matheesha Pathirana, Noor Ahmad, Ravichandran Ashwin, Devon Conway, Syed Khaleel Ahmed, Rachin Ravindra, Rahul Tripathi, Vijay Shankar, Sam Curran, Shaik Rashid, Anshul Kamboj, Mukesh Choudhary, Deepak Hooda, Gurjanpreet Singh, Nathan Ellis, Jamie Overton, Kamlesh Nagarkoti, Ramakrishnan Ghosh, Shreyas Gopal, Vansh Bedi, Andre Siddarth.Quinton de Kock (wk), Sunil Narine, Ajinkya Rahane (c), Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Venkatesh Iyer, Rinku Singh, Manish Pandey, Andre Russell, Ramandeep Singh, Harshit Rana, Spencer Johnson, Varun Chakaravarthy, Anrich Nortje, Vaibhav Arora, Anukul Roy, Luvnith Sisodia, Moeen Ali, Rovman Powell, Mayank Markande, Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Chetan Sakariya.301910According to Accuweather.com, the weather in the morning is expected to be pretty warm, rising to 36 degrees. It is expected to come down to 30 at the time of the match with clear, breezy weather while the temperature will drop to 26 at night.

Ms dhoni will take over as captain for the remainder of the ipl.

Article Title: IPL 2025 Points Table: Who stands where after CSK vs KKR match
Article Text:
Image credit: BCCI/IPL

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

IPL: RCB mentor Karthik questions Chinnaswamy pitch after twin defeats

NEW DELHI: Kolkata Knight Riders ‚Äô dominant eight-wicket win over Chennai Super Kings on Friday not only lifted their confidence but also gave a significant push to their position on the IPL 2025 points table . KKR, with this victory, now sit third in the standings with 6 points from 6 matches (3 wins, 3 losses), and a healthy Net Run Rate (NRR) of +0.803.Gujarat Titans continue to lead the table with 8 points from 5 matches, boasting an impressive +1.413 NRR.Right behind them are the unbeaten Delhi Capitals, who also have 8 points but in 4 matches, with a strong NRR of +1.278, showcasing their dominance early in the season. Delhi Capitals are the only unbeaten side in the tournament so far.KKR are followed closely by Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB), who are fourth with 6 points from 5 matches and a +0.539 NRR.Punjab Kings occupy fifth place with the same number of points from 4 games, while Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) are sixth with 6 points in 5 outings and a modest +0.078 NRR.Rajasthan Royals, after a strong start, have slipped to seventh with only 4 points from 5 matches and a concerning -0.733 NRR.Mumbai Indians, Chennai Super Kings, and Sunrisers Hyderabad are all tied at the bottom with just 2 points each.However, CSK‚Äôs crushing defeat has pushed them to ninth place due to a poor NRR of -1.554 ‚Äî their worst start in an IPL season.Sunrisers Hyderabad sit at the bottom (10th) with the lowest NRR in the league so far (-1.629), despite playing one game fewer than CSK.
Article Summary: Kolkata knight riders beat chennai super kings by eight wickets. Kkr now sit third in the ipl standings with 6 points from 6 matches. Gujarat titans continue to lead the table with 8 points from 5 matches. Delhi capitals are the only unbeaten side in the tournament so far.

Milwaukee Bucks head coach Doc Rivers, left, talk with forward Giannis Antetokounmpo (34) during the second half of an NBA basketball game against the Miami Heat, Saturday, April 5, 2025, in Miami. (AP Photo/Lynne Sladky)

Giannis Antetokounmpo‚Äôs

Will Giannis Antetokounmpo play tonight against the Detroit Pistons? Milwaukee Bucks injury report (April 11, 2025)

Milwaukee Bucks vs Detroit Pistons: Key team stats

What to expect from tonight‚Äôs game between the Milwaukee Bucks and Detyroit Pistons?

When and where to watch the Milwaukee Bucks play tonight against the Detroit Pistons (April 11, 2025)?

Theface uncertainty asinjury status remains a key storyline heading into their matchup against the Detroit Pistons . While the Bucks have already ruled out Damian Lillard and Jericho Sims, Antetokounmpo‚Äôs condition could significantly impact the game‚Äôs outcome.The Pistons, coming off a strong win against the New York Knicks, are looking to capitalize on any potential Bucks weaknesses. With playoff seeding still in flux, Milwaukee‚Äôs approach to managing injuries will be crucial. The team has listed Tyler Smith as day-to-day, but all eyes are on Giannis Antetokounmpo, whose availability could swing the game.Both Jericho Sims and Damian Lillard are out for the Bucks, and Tyler Smith is listed as day-to-day. However, there has been no official update on Giannis Antetokounmpo , leaving fans and analysts speculating about his status. If he sits, the Pistons may have an easier path to securing a win and improving their playoff positioning.The Bucks, already missing key players, will need others to step up if their star forward is sidelined. The Pistons, meanwhile, are dealing with their own injury concerns, as Jaden Ivey has only recently been cleared for basketball activities.The regular season matchup between the Milwaukee Bucks and the Detroit Pistons showcases two closely matched teams. The Bucks hold a slight edge with a 46-34 record, placing them 5th in the standings, just above the Pistons who sit 6th with a 44-36 record. At home, Milwaukee has a 19-20 record, while Detroit fares slightly better away at 22-18. In terms of efficiency metrics, the Bucks rank 12th in offensive rating, 11th in defensive rating, and 12th in net rating. The Pistons trail slightly in offense (14th in offensive rating), but they have a stronger defense (9th in defensive rating) and edge out Milwaukee in net rating at 11th. With such balanced stats, this matchup promises to be highly competitive.With tip-off set for 7:00 PM ET on NBA TV, this game could have major implications for the Eastern Conference standings. The Pistons are fighting to avoid the play-in tournament, while the Bucks aim to secure a higher seed. Giannis Antetokounmpo‚Äôs presence‚Äîor absence‚Äîwill be the deciding factor in what promises to be a tightly contested matchup.Fans can catch the game on FanDuel Sports Network Detroit or listen via ALT 98.7 radio. As the regular season winds down, every game matters, and Milwaukee‚Äôs handling of Antetokounmpo‚Äôs health will be under scrutiny.
Article Summary: The milwaukee bucks host the detroit pistons (april 11, 2025) tip-off is set for 7:00 pm et on nba tv. Giannis antetokounmpo‚Äôs presence will be the deciding factor in what promises to be a tightly contested matchup. The bucks hold a slight edge with a 46-34 record, placing them 5th in the standings.

Article Title: 'Mera ground hai ye': KL Rahul makes a bold statement after his heroics against RCB
Article Text:
Delhi Capitals KL Rahul celebrates after hitting the winning run against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (Screengrabs)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Which do you think is more crucial for a successful innings? Mental preparation Technical skills

After hitting the winning run against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB), Delhi Capitals batter KL Rahul dug his bat into the ground like a sword, marked his territory, pointed to his badge and said "Ye mera ground hai (This is my ground)."Also See: CSK vs KKR, IPL Live Score "This is my ground, my home, know this (ground) better than anyone else," he said at the post-match presentation.On Thursday night, KL Rahul scored a measured 93 not out to guide Delhi Capitals to a six-wicket win against Royal Challengers Bengaluru at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium . Chasing a modest 164, Delhi Capitals stuttered at the start but Rahul's composed knock from 53 balls with six sixes and seven fours did the job for his side.Rahul's innings was a prime example of risk management as he started at a slower tempo before shifting the gears seamlessly."It was a slightly tricky wicket but what helped me was being behind the stumps for 20 overs, watching how the wicket played. The ball sat in the wicket but it was consistent throughout, it was one-paced."I knew what my shots are, wanted to get off to a good start, and then assess it accordingly. It depends on the conditions and the ground and the dimensions. On a wicket like this, I knew what my pockets were."If I wanted to hit a big six, I knew what pockets to target, and keeping gave me a feeler for where other batters were dismissed and where they hit the sixes. Got lucky with the dropped catch."Rahul acknowledged it was a tricky pitch but he always experiment during the practice."Something I have always done with my preparation is that I always try to adapt to different wickets (even in practice)."I experiment in practice, get out a couple of times but it gives me a fair idea of the areas I can target - where I can take singles, where I can hit sixes."I don't keep batting for hours and hours and keep slogging. I do that sometimes but that is when I am not getting into a flow and rhythm. It is more about how I can master playing (on a particular pitch) and that becomes second-nature."Delhi Capitals are unbeaten in the tournament and are currently placed at top of the points table.
Article Summary: Kl rahul scored 93 not out to guide delhi capitals to a six-wicket win against royal challengers bengaluru. Rahul's composed knock from 53 balls with six sixes and seven fours did the job for his side. Delhi capitals are unbeaten in the tournament and are currently placed at top of the points table.

Article Title: Picking IPL over PSL goes wrong! Corbin Bosch now apologises to Pakistan after one-year ban
Article Text:
PSL vs IPL

Poll What impact will Bosch's withdrawal have on Peshawar Zalmi's performance? Unsure No impact at all Minor impact Significant negative impact

Astrologer Predicts: Will Hardik Pandya & Mumbai Indians work out?

NEW DELHI: South African all-rounder Corbin Bosch has expressed regret over his decision to withdraw from the 10th season of Pakistan Super League (PSL).In a statement, Bosch acknowledged the disappointment caused by his actions and offered sincere apologies to the people of Pakistan, the fans of Peshawar Zalmi , and the wider cricket community .Also See: KKR vs CSK Live Score, IPL 2025 ‚ÄúI deeply regret my decision to withdraw from the Pakistan Super League (PSL) and offer my sincere apologies to the people of Pakistan, the fans of Peshawar Zalmi and the wider cricket community," the South African said.‚ÄúThe PSL is a prestigious tournament, and I fully understand the disappointment caused by my actions. To the loyal fans of Peshawar Zalmi, I am truly sorry for letting you down."Bosch, who was picked by Peshawar Zalmi in the Diamond category during the tenth edition of the PSL Player Draft, recognised the prestigious nature of the tournament and the significance of his withdrawal.Having joined the Indian Premier League side Mumbai Indians for the 2025 season as the replacement for Lizaad Williams, he took full responsibility for his actions and accepted the consequences, including a penalty fine and a one-year ban from the tournament.‚ÄúI take full responsibility for my actions and accept the consequences, including the penalty fine and the one-year ban from the PSL. This has been a hard lesson, but I am committed to learning from this experience and hope to return to the PSL in the future with renewed dedication and the trust of the fans,‚Äù he further added.Bosch's statement reflects an understanding of the gravity of his decision and its impact on the tournament, the team, and the fans.By accepting the consequences and expressing a desire to learn and improve, he has demonstrated a level of accountability and a willingness to rectify the situation.
Article Summary: South african all-rounder corbin bosch has expressed regret over his decision to withdraw from the 10th season of pakistan super league. Bosch acknowledged the disappointment caused by his actions and offered sincere apologies to the people of pakistan, the fans of peshawar zalmi, and the wider cricket community.

Article Title: Anthony Edwards was cussed out before Minnesota Timberwolves crushed Memphis Grizzlies: ‚ÄúI gotta be better‚Äù
Article Text:
Image credit: Getty Images

Minnesota Timberwolves were cussed out by coach at halftime

The Minnesota Timberwolves notched an important 141-125 win over the Memphis Grizzlies on Thursday, with shooting guard Anthony Edwards playing a major role by dropping 44 points. In his postgame interview, Edwards shared how head coach Chris Finch cussed out the team at halftime, lighting a fire that helped them snatch the victory from the Grizzlies. The shift in their defensive intensity after the break was evident on the court.According to SportingNews.com, Edwards said, "We got cussed out at halftime, especially myself, about my effort on defense, so we put emphasis on that side of the court. Gameplan mistakes, myself. I'm talking about blown gameplan mistakes, mental mistakes that I shouldn't be making in five years of experience in the league. I shouldn't make those gameplan mistakes so I gotta be better."Beyond his honest revelation about being cussed out, Edwards was also a riot during a live interview when he playfully interrupted Minnesota star Julius Randle , shouting, "I'm the best in the world! Go tell all the girls!" Randle struggled to continue the interview, laughing and calling Edwards ‚Äúcrazy‚Äù in response to the disruption.Speaking with TNT, Edwards also revealed that his trainer sends him motivational videos of Michael Jordan for inspiration. ‚ÄúHans, my trainer told me to black out tonight, so I tried to do that. We'll be watching, like, I know people are going to love this. He sent me, like, MJ videos every day about, like, blacking out. And I think MJ said something like, why would I worry about a miss if I haven't took the shot yet? So he'd be sending me stuff like that. So I appreciate him.‚ÄùAlso Read: Golden State Warriors regain control of playoff destiny after Memphis Grizzlies fall to Minnesota Timberwolves Thursday‚Äôs win gives the Timberwolves a stronger shot at the Western Conference playoffs, as they are now tied with Memphis in the standings. Had they lost, their chances of securing a playoff spot would have taken a major hit. This season, Edwards is averaging 27.6 points, 5.7 rebounds, 4.5 assists, and 1.1 steals per game, while shooting a career-best 39.7 percent from beyond the arc. The wolves are now aiming to clinch victories in their upcoming two games.
Article Summary: Minnesota timberwolves beat memphis grizzlies 141-125 on thursday. Shooting guard anthony edwards dropped 44 points for the wolves. Edwards revealed that coach chris finch cussed out the team at halftime. Edwards also revealed that his trainer sends him motivational videos of michael jordan for inspiration.

Article Title: What is the net worth of Scottie Pippen in 2025? How the former Chicago Bulls star‚Äôs financial portfolio dwindled over the years?
Article Text:
Net worth of Scottie Pippen in 2025 (Image Source: Instagram/scottiepippen )

What is Scottie Pippen's Net Worth in 2025?

Scottie Pippen has played in the NBA for 17 seasons and has six NBA Championship wins under his belt. The athlete is considered to be one of the greatest small forwards in NBA history. Additionally, his achievements include being one of the two players in history who have won an Olympic Gold Medal and an NBA title twice in the same year. After earning great fame and recognition, we are taking a look at how this has impacted his financial portfolio.According to Celebrity Net Worth, Scottie Pippen has a net worth of $20 million. This comes after playing with the Chicago Bulls for 12 seasons, with the Houston Rockets for one season and the Portland Trail Blazers for four seasons. After all the achievements and accolades, his net worth is not as high as his peers. This comes after the star is known to be one of the most underpaid players of all time. He signed a 7-year contract with the Bulls for $18 million. Thus, when the Bulls were at their peak and Michael Jordan would earn $30+ million annually, Pippen would only earn $2.6 million.However, his contract with the Houston Rockets earned him a staggering $67.2 million. Post this, when he joined the Bulls during the last two years of his career, he earned $10 million. While he has earned over $109 million over the years as an NBA player, his net worth has diminished massively.Pippen's net worth also accounted to numerous brand endorsements. He had signed a deal with Avia early in his career. Post this he had also signed a contract with Nike. Other popular brand endorsements include Frito-Lay, McDonald's, Coca Cola, Right Guard and Visa.Also Read: Exploring the personal life of Scottie Pippen However, bad financial decisions have dwindled his net worth to $20 million. He lost $20 million due to his financial advisor, who turned out to be a fraud. Additionally, Pippen has eight children and had to pay child support for each of them. The court had ordered him to pay half of his retirement fund from the Chicago Bulls as a divorce settlement. This also had a severe blow to his net worth. He also had to support his family of 12 siblings as his father was paralyzed due to a stroke.
Article Summary: Scottie pippen has played in the nba for 17 seasons and has six nba championship wins under his belt. The athlete is considered to be one of the greatest small forwards in nba history. However, bad financial decisions have dwindled his net worth to $20 million. He had to support his family of 12 siblings as his father was paralyzed due to a stroke.
